00030 CSwordLDKey::CSwordLDKey( CSwordModuleInfo* module ) {
00031     if ((m_module = dynamic_cast<CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*>(module))) {
00032 //    *(m_module->module()) = TOP;  
00033   }
00034   SWKey::operator = (" ");
00035 }
00036 
00038 CSwordLDKey::CSwordLDKey( const CSwordLDKey &k ) : SWKey((const char*)k), CSwordKey(k) {
00039 }
00040 
00042 CSwordLDKey::CSwordLDKey( const SWKey *k, CSwordModuleInfo* module) : SWKey(*k), CSwordKey(module) {
00043 }

00046 CSwordLDKey* CSwordLDKey::copy() const {
00047     return new CSwordLDKey(*this);
00048 }
00049 
00051 CSwordModuleInfo* const CSwordLDKey::module(CSwordModuleInfo* const newModule){ 
00052     if (newModule && newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon) {
00053         const QString oldKey = key();   
00054         m_module = newModule;
00055         key(oldKey);
00056     }   
00057     return m_module;
00058 }
00059 
00061 const QString CSwordLDKey::key(){
00062 //  return QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)*this);//don't use fromUtf8
00063     return QString::fromUtf8((const char*)*this);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CSwordLDKey::key( const QString& newKey ){
00067 //  SWKey::operator = ((const char*)newKey.local8Bit());        
00068     SWKey::operator = ((const char*)newKey.utf8());     
00069     m_module->module()->SetKey(this);
00070     m_module->snap();
00071     SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());
00072 }
00073 
00075 CSwordLDKey* CSwordLDKey::NextEntry(){
00076     m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!        
00077     ( *( m_module->module() ) )++;
00078     key(m_module->module()->KeyText());
00079     SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());  
00080     
00081     return this;
00082 }
00083 
00085 CSwordLDKey* CSwordLDKey::PreviousEntry(){
00086     m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!        
00087     ( *( m_module->module() ) )--;
00088     SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());  
00089     
00090     return this;
00091 }
00092 
00094 void CSwordLDKey::key( const char* newKey ){
00095     if (newKey) {
00096         SWKey::operator = (newKey);
00097 
00098         m_module->module()->SetKey(this);
00099         m_module->snap();
00100         SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00105 CSwordLDKey& CSwordLDKey::operator = (const QString& keyname ){
00106   key(keyname);
00107   return *this;
00108 }
